thread.title: Good location slow lifts
thread.title_full: Good location slow lifts - Review of nyma, the New York Manhattan Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: DH14
title: Good location slow lifts
text:
This is a small decent hotel in a good location. It's near Penn Station in Korea Town, pretty easy to get to many popular sites.
Rooms were surprisingly spacious and clean. I had a view of the Empire State Building. The price was good compared to many other hotels.
On the downside, the elevator was slow in the mornings around breakfast time. My room was on the 15th floor and on the first day I think I read War and Peace while waiting for the lift and was about to make a start on Anna Karenina.
Talking of breakfast, it was included. The breakfast room was rather crowded. There was a spread of cereals, waffles, donuts, some rather tired looking scrambled egg and some fruit. We decided to eat elsewhere.
But overall a decent and reasonably priced hotel in a good location.
